alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 27 at 3:29AM PST until December 27 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys and San Francisco Bay Shoreline Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 1 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tidal levels are running around 1 foot higher than tidal predictions. High tide will peak about 10:46 am PST Wednesday between 7.0 to 7.5 feet above MLLW, resulting in minor coastal flooding for low-lying, flood-prone spots adjacent to the San Francisco Bay.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
